title: Bug 14113: Should listen to FSOURCEATTACHED and FSOURCEDETACHED java deltas
description: Bug 14113: Should listen to FSOURCEATTACHED and FSOURCEDETACHED java deltas
OB: When changing the attached source of a JAR in Build 20020416, a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta is currently fired, which is incorrect. As a consequence, the UI reacts by closing the class file editors opened on this JAR, which is appropriate for a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta. However, attempting to fix the delta to be a (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta does not trigger the expected UI reaction.
EB: Expect the system to appropriately listen to FSOURCEATTACHED and FSOURCEDETACHED java deltas when changing the attached source of a JAR. The UI should react accordingly without closing class file editors in response to a (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open Build 20020416. 
2. Change the attached source of a JAR. 
3. Observe the firing of a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta instead of the expected (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta. 
4. Note the inappropriate UI reaction of closing class file editors on the affected JAR.
